name: Space Chase DX
description:
A GBC update to my first game, Space Chase: https://starwolf128.itch.io/space-chase

Contains full color graphics (technically even the space background had to recolored) & an extra bonus level that doubles the total game's length!

Original game's Description: 

In Space Chase, the player is an intergalactic custom officer in charge of inspecting every ship passing through their assigned sector of space. Any ship that's holding wanted criminals, illegal goods, or is breaking some other vague Terrican law must be arrested in order for the player to progress to the next level.
